entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 mm. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to periods of snow in the evening. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
